text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for competitive gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1060 in the Lenovo Y520 80YY0090US 15.6'' FHD GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i7-7700HQ 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

The Lenovo Y520 80YY0090US 15.6'' FHD GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i7-7700HQ 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop does what it says on the tin. Good for streaming games, but the build material could be better. Had a minor issue with bloatware, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.

It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Call of Duty: Warzone, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the Lenovo Y520 80YY0090US 15.6'' FHD GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i7-7700HQ 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop. The speakers is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.

An average performer. The NVIDIA GTX 1060 is good, but I expected a bit more from the screen brightness on the Lenovo Y520 80YY0090US 15.6'' FHD GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i7-7700HQ 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Starfield and Apex Legends. The build quality of the Lenovo Y520 80YY0090US 15.6'' FHD GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i7-7700HQ 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop is solid, and the port selection is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!
